title: The Secret garden (Captioned)
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Clarence Brown and Fred M Wilcox
brief_description: A delightful dramatisation based on the well-known children’s book of the same name. A young girl comes to live in a run down Victorian estate and finds an abandoned garden which she cares for. She befriends the young crippled son of the house - with amazing results. Starring Margaret O’Brien and Dean Stcokwell.
